TTO.JO.summary: Trustco Group Holdings Limited operates as diversified financial services company. It operates through three segments: Insurance and its Investments, Banking and Finance, and Resources. The Insurance and its Investments segment provides short-term insurance covering legal and business products; and long-term insurance, including life and credit life, health, and investment and savings products to individuals and SME's. This segment also invests primarily in mixed use land development, as well as offers construction and management services; and provides air, as well as strategic media services. The Banking and Finance segment provides banking products to individuals and businesses, which promotes economic development; financial assistance services for educational and training purposes; and long-term property advances. The Resources segment primarily conducts mining operations. It has operations in Namibia, South Africa, Mauritius, and Sierra Leone. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Windhoek, Namibia.
